1. Description¶

This is the pipieline

1.1. Scripts¶

1.1.1. promBED_fromGeneBED_20kbHardCoded_figures.py¶

This script will make a distribution plot from the bedfile genereated by promBED_fromGeneBED_20kbHardCoded.py

usage: promBED_fromGeneBED_20kbHardCoded_figures.py [-h] BED_in out_dir
bed_in¶

path to promoter annotation in BED format

out_dir¶

path to directory where the figure should be written

-h, --help¶

show this help message and exit
